alert.note: Alert for Southern Centre; Southern Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL CENTRE AND SOUTH CENTRAL CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Bellefonte, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Lamar, Millheim, Aaronsburg, Rebersburg, Madisonburg and Mackeyville. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
